org.turbogwt.net.http

Class Requestor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turbogwt.net.http.Requestor

  • public class Requestor
extends Object
    This class is a configurable FluentRequest factory. Usually, you will use it as a singleton along your project.

    It provides a convenience API for building/executing HTTP Requests.

    You can register RequestFilters with #registerRequestFilter, so the are executed over all your requests. The same for ResponseFilter.

    You can register custom Serializer with #registerSerializer. The same for Deserializer. If you want to support both serialization and deserialization for your custom object, register a Serdes with #registerSerdes.

    SerDes for String, Number, Boolean and JavaScriptObject are already provided.

    Define the way params with multiple values should be processed to form your URIs with #setDefaultStrategy.

    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

      • request

        public <RequestType,ResponseType> FluentRequest<RequestType,ResponseType> request(Class<RequestType> requestType,
                                                                         Class<ResponseType> responseType)
        Create a FluentRequest of RequestType request content and ResponseType response content.
        Type Parameters:
        RequestType - The type of the request content.
        ResponseType - The type of the response content.
        Parameters:
        requestType - The class of the request content type.
        responseType - The class of the response content type.
        Returns:
        The FluentRequest with the specified request/response contents.

      • request

        public <RequestType,ResponseType> FluentRequest<RequestType,ResponseType> request(Class<RequestType> requestType,
                                                                         Class<ResponseType> responseType,
                                                                         MultipleParamStrategy strategy)
        Create a FluentRequest of RequestType request content and ResponseType response content, and set a custom MultipleParamStrategy for handling multiple params.
        Type Parameters:
        RequestType - The type of the request content.
        ResponseType - The type of the response content.
        Parameters:
        requestType - The class of the request content type.
        responseType - The class of the response content type.
        strategy - The strategy for separating params with multiple values.
        Returns:
        The FluentRequest with the specified request/response contents.

      • get

        public <ResponseType,C extends Collection<ResponseType>,A extends ContainerAsyncCallback<C,ResponseType>> Request get(String uri,
                                                                                                             Class<ResponseType> responseType,
                                                                                                             A callback)
        Performs a GET request on the specified URI, returning a collection of ResponseType. You should use some subclass of ContainerAsyncCallback for retrieving the expected values.
        Type Parameters:
        ResponseType - The type of the response content.
        C - The collection type to accumulate the response.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri for the request.
        responseType - The class of the response type.
        callback - The callback for retrieving a collection of ResponseType.
        Returns:
        The launched Request.
        See Also:
        ListAsyncCallback, SetAsyncCallback

      • getDefaultStrategy

        public MultipleParamStrategy getDefaultStrategy()

      • setDefaultStrategy

        public void setDefaultStrategy(MultipleParamStrategy defaultStrategy)
        Set the default strategy to separate params with multiple values. You can use one of the constants provided at MultipleParamStrategy or implement a customized one.
        Parameters:
        defaultStrategy - The MultipleParamStrategy to be initially set in all FluentRequests created.

      • getDefaultContentType

        public String getDefaultContentType()

      • getDefaultAccept

        public String getDefaultAccept()

      • registerDeserializer

        public <T> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration registerDeserializer(Class<T> type,
                                                           Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Register a deserializer of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the deserializer's type.
        deserializer - The deserializer of T.
        Returns:
        The Registration object, capable of cancelling this registration.

      • registerSerializer

        public <T> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration registerSerializer(Class<T> type,
                                                         Serializer<T> serializer)
        Register a serializer of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the serializer's type.
        serializer - The serializer of T.
        Returns:
        The Registration object, capable of cancelling this registration.
